lessons.indonesian: If you eat too much, you'll become fat.
If you eat too much, you will get fat.

lessons.japanese: そんなに食べると太るよ。
lessons.indonesian: You'll fatten up if you eat that much.

lessons.japanese: そんなに食べると太るよ。
lessons.indonesian: If you eat that much, you'll get fat.
